Reptate Modelling Software (Open Access Freeware - Weblink)

(Rheology of Entangled Polymers: Toolkit for Analysis of Theory & Experiment) is a free and open source software package for viewing, exchanging and analysing experimental data. It features a command-line interface and a graphical user interface.
Aktivität IRIS Modelling Software (Wikipedia - Weblink) auswählen
IRIS stands for Interactive Rheology Information System....

Our software platform, which supports this mission, has a central hub (IRIS Rheo-Hub) where rheological experiments and advanced theories can be easily juxtaposed so they can be efficiently analyzed, compared, categorized, viewed, “smart-plotted” and parameterized.

Our hub evolved over many years, and with the help of many contributors, and is known for its easy-to-use interface. In this way, the IRIS environment stimulates discovery and prepares for decision making.
